name: MCM 'R.E.A.L (Rhymes Equal Actual Life)' Feat. C-Lone 7"
description: This limited edition 7" vinyl from MCM, released in conjunction with Headcount Records is a little slice of history. The former lyricist and front-man of the pioneering UK Hip Hop crew, Caveman delivers two solid joints. The A Side cut, R.E.A.L (Rhymes Equal Actual Life) is featuring fellow High Wycombe emcee C-Lone and is produced by Rinse Dog with the cuts by Mr Brown. The B-side cut is through and through MCM. Label: KingUnderground/Headcount Records Catalogue: KU/HC-001 Format: 7" (250 copies pressed on black vinyl) Listen to Audio Samples

name: Simiah 'Purple Dreams' (Deluxe Edition) EP
description: Now shipping. Simiah’s ‘Purple Dreams’. 6 instrumental track EP, re-mastered for vinyl by Mr Brown. Originally planned just to be a 10 track free download but now available on wax. Includes a vinyl exclusive, bonus song called “In This”. 100/300 copies available on purple vinyl. Featuring the Ernest Herb and the Fat Controller on the keys. Original cover artwork by Skev with the layout by Bee. Label: KingUnderground Records  Catalogue: KU-007  Format: 12" (limited edition of 300, pressed on 140 gram black vinyl with 100/300 pressed on purple vinyl) More Info “Purple Dreams” was created in late September 2011, originally as a free download and warm up to Simiah’s debut LP, “Lost in Time”. Around this time Simiah was hanging out with the multi-talented musician named Ernest Herb. The two were regularly jamming, performing live shows and recording one-take tracks together in an old air craft hanger at the back of a pub in Milton Keynes. This is where the song “Everywhere” was created. Ernest Herb then called in his friend The Fat Controller to jam with the two of them and add some ill guitar to some of the songs. After recording track after track together, Simiah then narrowed the track list down to his favourite cuts. For the vinyl version of the project he added in a bonus beat, which was a beat made in the summer of 2013. We then called in Mr Brown to re-master the project for vinyl. The original artwork design was done by Skev, one of Simiah’s best friends. Then Bee aka Mr Brown (the man behind most of the KU artwork) arranged the text and finessed the layout. Listen to Audio Samples

name: Lord Finesse 'Fuck ‘Em' (Underboss Remix) 12"
description: Pre-order, shipping 30.09.13. Slice Of Spice Records new Founding Format series of audiophile approved 180 gram 12" vinyl features the legendary Funkyman himself, Lord Finesse. For this series Finesse has served up three remixes of some of his classics, all presented in the adult sized vinyl format. This remix was originally crafted last year for a special edition flexi-disc included in Issue 22 of Wax Poetics Japan. Finesse has since taken the mix to another level for an audiophile vinyl press, and called in Large Professor for the ad-libs. This high quality limited edition pressing also includes the instrumental version and for the very first time in any format, the acappella on the flip. A1 - Vocal B1 - Instrumental B2 - Acapella Label: Slice-of-Spice Records Catalogue: SSR-019 Format: 12" (pressed on 180 gram black vinyl, limited edition of 500 copies)

name: Mr Brown 'Hubwish' B/W 'Ebondo' 7" (Deluxe Edition)
description: NOW SHIPPING! Sampling breaks is at the core of Hip Hop music and played a crucial role in its foundation and development. Back in March of 2012, Dephect Clothing started a “Buy Records” campaign to help promote the awareness of vinyl. The Buy Records video (below) gives a brief insight into the process of how vinyl was traditionally sampled in the production of Hip Hop. It follows the UK producer Mr Brown while out digging for records, then going back to his studio, chopping up a sample and making a beat. Label: KingUnderground Records Catalogue: KU-003 Format: 7" (Deluxe Edition pressed on purple vinyl, limited edition of 100/250 copies) Artwork: Richard 'Bee' Brown Watch the video below and download for FREE the ‘Hubwish’ mp3 via the Dephect website. name: Lewis Parker 'Walking on a Razor' 12" (Standard Edition)
description: NOW SHIPPING EARLY! This is the second single taken from Lewis Parker's forthcoming album "The Glass Ceiling". 'Walking on a Razor' part 1, has Lewis Parker demonstrating his skills on the mic over a raw, hard beat with those classic sounding Lewis Parker drums! Whilst on 'Walking on a Razor' part 2, Lewis called in two legends of the game, Sadat X & Shabaam Sahdeeq to lay two hot verses, as well as featuring a verse from Mr Parker himself. We could of left it like that... but as an added bonus there are also two, Lewis Parker remixes of part 2! Plus instrumentals to all the tracks and an accapella! Label: KingUnderground Records / WODV Catalogue: KU/WODV-004 Format: LP (12'', vinyl, Pressed on standard 140 gram black vinyl) Walking on a Razor Part 2 is featuring Sadat X & Shabaam Sahdeeq. All tracks produced by Lewis Parker. Listen to Audio Samples Walking on a Razor Pt 1 (vocal edit). Walking on a Razor Pt 2 Walking on a Razor Pt 1 (instrumental edit). Walking on a Razor Pt 2 (instrumental) Walking on a Razor Pt 2 (accapella) Walking on a Razor Pt 2 (sliced bass remix) Walking on a Razor Pt 2 (sliced bass remix instrumental). Walking on a Razor Pt 2 (sharp edged remix) Walking on a Razor Pt 2 (sharp edged remix instrumental)"><

name: Pings 'You & Me' Feat. Rob-O 7"
description: Shipping now. This is the debut release of UK producer/DJ, Pings. The title track is soulful, jazzy and uplifting and features Rob-O formerly of INI on the vocals. Rob-O’s classic flows roll over Pings's chopped up piano sample and boom bap drums. The ‘You & Me’ vocal hook is dripping with soul and complements the content of Rob-O’s reminiscent raps. He describes the vibes and the highs and lows captured in the group INI and tells a story of the groups progression. The B-side features an instrumental song called ‘Fly Away’. The track is centred around string samples and a bouncing bass-line with guitar & piano samples throughout. To complete the track there's a ‘Fly Away’ vocal sample that compliments the song really well. Also on the B-side is the instrumental version of ‘You & Me. Label: KingUnderground Records Catalogue: KU-002 Format: 7'' (vinyl, limited edition of 300 copies) All tracks produced by Pings. Listen to Audio Samples You & Me Feat. Rob-O Fly Away You & Me (Instrumental)

name: K-Def 'Signature Sevens Vol.1 - What Goes Up' (Feat. Rated R) 7"
description: SHIPPING NOW! Slice-of-Spice have teamed up with Ghettoman Beats to present the "K-Def Signature Sevens" on 7" vinyl. Volume 1 is the first in the series of 3 releases coming out in November/December 2012. All of the tracks were recorded during K's "House of Hits" phase on his MPC 60 in the B-Room in the early 90's. The first in the series sees K-Def presenting the previously unheard track, "What Goes Up" from Rated R. Label: Slice-of-Spice Catalogue: SSR-009 Format: 7" (vinyl, 500 copies with full colour art by Joe Buck, 3mm spine, pressed on 70 gram black vinyl) All tracks produced by K-Def. Listen to Audio Samples What Goes Up (Vocal) What Goes Up (Instrumental)

name: Mr Brown 'We Don't Quit' Feat. Copywrite 7"
description: After the successful release of Mr Brown's debut instrumental EP 'Beats For Days' his next vinyl offering comes in the form of a limited edition (300 copies), hand numbered, clear red 7” vinyl and features the lyrical talents of US MC Copywrite! This song was originally recorded in 2008 and has yet to be released....... until now! The song is called 'We Don't Quit' and is pure boom bap hip hop through and through. Heavy hard hitting beat, tight scratches and Copywrite coming ripping it up on the sort of beat you rarely get to hear him on these days, basically all the ingredients needed to cook up a hip hop banger! As an added bonus Mr Brown has thrown in 2 extra bonus beats that are exclusive to the 7” vinyl release. LIMITED EDITION VINYL (300 COPIES) / HAND NUMBERED / CLEAR RED VINYL / PACKED IN PLAIN WHITE SLEEVE & PROTECTIVE DUST JACKET Label: KingUnderground/We Stay True Recods Catalogue: WSTV-002 Format: 7'' (vinyl, limited to 300 copies) All tracks Produced by Mr Brown. We Don't Quit Bonus Beat 1 We Don't Quit (Instrumental) Bonus Beat 2

SELECT THE COMBO DEAL: Spend an extra ten pounds and you'll get an LP+7" with your t-shirt when you purchase the "Combo Deal", while stock lasts.

name: Simiah 'Lost in Time' LP (Deluxe Edition)
description: SOLD OUT. 2 versions of this record are available. The first 100 copies are pressed on white vinyl and are exclusive to KingUnderground. There are also 150 copies available on standard black vinyl. Lost in Time is the long overdue debut release from Bristol based producer, Simiah. A hip hop purist at heart Simiah produces his music on the MPC and samples predominantly from vinyl. Inspired by a wide variety of musical genres his music is as forward thinking as it is classic sounding. This forward thinking yet purist approach has Simiah creating accessible and hypnotic head-nodding rhythms for you to immerse yourself in. We hope you enjoy the project as much as we enjoyed putting it together. Label: KingUnderground Records Catalogue: KU-001 Format: LP (12'', vinyl, limited to 250 copies. 100 of those copies are available on white vinyl) The track 'Green Memories' is featuring Ernest Herb. All tracks produced by Simiah. Listen to Audio Samples Intro Gene You Can't Be No Questions Summer Time Lost Dreams It's Time Beautiful Boxing Rounds Travelling Green Memories I Don't Know

name: Lewis Parker 'Walking on a Razor' 12" (Deluxe Edition)
description: SOLD OUT. This is the second single taken from Lewis Parker's forthcoming album "The Glass Ceiling". 'Walking on a Razor' part 1, has Lewis Parker demonstrating his skills on the mic over a raw, hard beat with those classic sounding Lewis Parker drums! Whilst on 'Walking on a Razor' part 2, Lewis called in two legends of the game, Sadat X & Shabaam Sahdeeq to lay two hot verses, as well as featuring a verse from Mr Parker himself. We could of left it like that... but as an added bonus there are also two, Lewis Parker remixes of part 2! Plus instrumentals to all the tracks and an accapella! Label: KingUnderground Records / WODV Catalogue: KU/WODV-004 Format: LP (12'', vinyl, deluxe edition pressed on standard 140 gram red vinyl. Limited to 200 copies only and comes with a Lewis Parker tag logo sticker) Walking on a Razor Part 2 is featuring Sadat X & Shabaam Sahdeeq. All tracks produced by Lewis Parker.
